lcm.common.delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{param}}?

lcm.licenses.title: Licenses
lcm.licenses.registerDevice.tooltip: Opens create device page in licensing center
lcm.licenses.goToLicensePortal.tooltip: Get licenses in ctrlX Device Portal
lcm.licenses.noTrustAnchorLine1: The license manager was not initialized as no secure trust anchor could be found on the system.
lcm.licenses.noTrustAnchorLine2: How to get a trust anchor?
lcm.licenses.noTrustAnchorLine4: Contact your device supplier on how to get a valid ctrlX Device ID
lcm.licenses.noTrustAnchorLine5: Please note that after applying any of the proposed solutions, the system needs to be rebooted.
lcm.licenses.name: Name
lcm.licenses.willBeStartedOnX:
Not yet active.
Will be started on {{param}}

lcm.settingsDialog.title: Settings
lcm.settingsDialog.serverBasedLicensing.title: Server based licensing
lcm.settingsDialog.temporaryUsageRights.title: Temporary usage rights
lcm.settingsDialog.deviceCertKeyHint: Note that the device certificate (and corresponding HSM-based key) must be present inside the 'Permanent Storage' under category 'Own' in order to be usable for the mutual TLS connection.

lcm.serverSettingsDialog.title: Server settings
lcm.serverSettingsDialog.renewalInterval: Renewal interval (minutes, recommended 80% of borrow interval)
lcm.serverSettingsDialog.renewalMustBeSmallerThanBorrow: Renewal interval must be smaller than borrow interval
lcm.serverSettingsDialog.enableClientAuth: Enable client authentication via mutual TLS
lcm.serverSettingsDialog.verifyAlways: Manually trust client certificates (interaction by administrator)
lcm.serverSettingsDialog.trustAndVerifyCa: Automatically trust client certificates on successful verification
lcm.serverSettingsDialog.caCerts: CA certificates to verify client requests
lcm.serverSettingsDialog.clickHereToAddCaCerts: Click here to add CA certificates:
lcm.serverSettingsDialog.osRootCertHint: Note that the ctrlX OS root certificate (com.ctrlx-automation.os.crt) will also be used as a trusted CA certificate for verifying client requests

lcm.tempUsageConfirmDialog.title: Temporary usage rights
lcm.tempUsageConfirmDialog.temporaryUsageRightsText: The "temporary usage rights" may only be activated for a device replacement in case of a defective device. They are valid for 10 days and can only be activated once. In addition, the license conditions of Bosch Rexroth AG apply {{param}}. After this period has expired, the apps will not restart without a valid license. Please contact your service contact person to transfer the licenses to the new device.
lcm.tempUsageConfirmDialog.generalTermsAndConditions: General Terms and Conditions of Deliveries and Services

lcm.notification.errorMissingPermissions: You do not have the required permissions.

lcm.licenseChangeReportDialog.title: License changes
lcm.licenseChangeReportDialog.returnLicenseNotePart1: To confirm the removal of the Licenses, upload the License Return File in the Licensing Center
lcm.licenseChangeReportDialog.returnLicenseNotePart2: This step is mandatory in order to make the removed Licenses available again.
lcm.licenseChangeReportDialog.licenseFileAlreadyProcessedMsg: The uploaded license file (Capability Response) has already been processed.
lcm.licenseChangeReportDialog.noLicensesAddedOrRemovedMsg: No licenses have been added or removed.
